SE_TORQUE_EXPLOSION.Name: You spin me right round, baby
SE_TORQUE_EXPLOSION.Description: Blow up the ship by spinning it too quickly.

SE_RGB_SETUP.Name: RGB Setup
SE_RGB_SETUP.Description: Set all of your ship colors to Rainbow.

SE_HOW_DID_WE_GET_HERE.Name: How did we get here?
SE_HOW_DID_WE_GET_HERE.Description: Have all of the ship's components and hulls be damaged at once.

SE_SCOUT_LOST_CONNECTION.Name: placeholder_scout_lost_connection
SE_SCOUT_LOST_CONNECTION.Description: Destroy your Little Scout and lose connection with it.

SE_FIRE_HAZARD.Name: Fire Hazard
SE_FIRE_HAZARD.Description: Leave a campfire lit inside of the ship for too long.

SE_HULK_SMASH.Name: Hulk Smash!
SE_HULK_SMASH.Description: Destroy your ship using only your character.

SE_BAD_INTERNET.Name: Bad Internet Connection
SE_BAD_INTERNET.Description: Land your ship on another planet with at least 3 seconds of input latency.
